rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open plan living area with a Bohemian decor style, incorporating colorful textiles and rustic furniture. The room opens to the central courtyard for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for communal dining with earthy finishes and reclaimed wood accents. Connects with the kitchen.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom featuring a Bohemian aesthetic with boho accessories and natural materials, located on the west side for positive Vastu energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with a Bohemian flair, decorated with handcrafted elements. It is positioned in the north-east corner for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space designed for flexible use or a study, featuring neutral tones and Bohemian touches. Located in the south-west zone to align with local norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A rustic, welcoming entrance that leads directly into the living area, ensuring a natural flow of energy in line with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.description: Open pathway connecting the central courtyard to all rooms, promoting an open and airy feel throughout the ground floor.

openings.name: Garden Gate
openings.description: A dedicated opening that leads from the courtyard to a large garden area on the west side of the property.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, designed with Bohemian tiles and fixtures to maintain a cohesive aesthetic.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Spare bathroom for guest convenience, featuring earthy finishes and natural lighting.

openings.name: Staircase to Ground Floor
openings.description: A central staircase connecting the upper floor with the ground level, ensuring fluid circulation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Rooftop Access
openings.description: An access point leading from the upper floor to a spacious rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A dedicated study area with ample natural light and comfortable seating, incorporating Bohemian elements like patterned rugs and artisanal decor.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: Direct access from the study to a large, open rooftop terrace designed for leisure and panoramic views of the garden.

openings.name: Garden View Balcony
openings.description: A balcony overlooking the large garden area on the west side, ensuring a serene and natural outlook.

central_courtyard.description: A generously sized central courtyard that serves as a focal point for natural light and ventilation, fostering a sense of calm and balance.

large_garden.description: An expansive garden area on the west side that complements the farmhouse's Bohemian aesthetic and provides outdoor recreational space.

rooftop_terrace.description: A spacious rooftop terrace designed for relaxation, dining, or social gatherings, offering a panoramic view of the garden and surrounding landscape.
